questions: Quantitative aptitude questions on profit/loss, time & work
Logical reasoning - pattern recognition, blood relations
Verbal ability - reading comprehension, grammar
tips: Focus on time management - 90 minutes for 80 questions
Practice TCS previous year papers extensively
Negative marking exists, so avoid wild guessing

questions: Find the second largest element in an array
Check if a string is palindrome (ignore spaces and case)
tips: Code in any language - C, C++, Java, Python allowed
Focus on clean, readable code with proper variable names
Test with edge cases before submitting

questions: Explain OOP concepts with examples
Difference between SQL and NoSQL databases

Explain your final year project in detail
tips: Be thorough with basics - OOP, DBMS, OS concepts
Prepare to explain your projects in detail
Practice explaining technical concepts in simple terms

questions: Tell me about yourself
Why TCS?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?
Are you willing to relocate?
tips: Research TCS values and recent news
Prepare STAR format answers for behavioral questions
Be honest about relocation preferences
TCS focuses heavily on aptitude - practice daily for 2-3 months
Be confident during technical round - they test depth of knowledge
Dress formally and maintain good body language throughout

questions: Quantitative aptitude - heavy focus on percentages and ratios
Logical reasoning - puzzles and analytical reasoning
Verbal ability - sentence correction and reading comprehension
tips: Infosys aptitude is slightly tougher than TCS
Time management is crucial - don't get stuck on difficult questions
Practice Infosys previous papers - pattern is consistent

questions: Find missing number in array of 1 to n
Reverse words in a sentence while maintaining word order
tips: Focus on optimal solutions - they check time complexity
Write clean code with proper comments
Test thoroughly before submission

questions: Explain normalization in databases

tips: Strong focus on Java and database concepts
Prepare design patterns thoroughly
Be ready to write code snippets during explanation

Emphasize learning agility and adaptability

Show enthusiasm for learning new technologies during HR round
